thought: To craft a nether_wart_block, I need to place nine nether_warts in a 3x3 square. Therefore, I will start by moving one of the nether_warts from slot 20 to the top left corner of the crafting grid (slot 1).
Ok
act: move from slot 20 to slot 1 with quantity 1
